Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Chicago
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Milwaukee, Chicago and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Morse. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Morse. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
